channel.title: Houndeye's not uncharging after being hit
channel.description: This is annoying me and it was an aspect of Half-life 1 and I believe it is a bug, they keep killing me because of this :|

item.title: Houndeye's not uncharging after being hit
item.dc:creator: red-wind
item.description:
Yeah I noticed that too.
Well I’m not sure they stopped after being hit with a pistol, but they definitely stopped after being hurt with the crowbar. I prefered it too. More logical when you think about it (getting a crowbar in their face should disorientate them), and easier to deal with when there’s a lot of houndeyes to kill.

Read full topic
item.source: Houndeye's not uncharging after being hit
